summary: A comedy set in the world of European royalty.
cast: Valérie Lemercier|Lambert Wilson|Catherine Deneuve|Michel Aumont|Mathilde Seigner|Denis Podalydès|Michel Vuillermoz|Gisèle Casadesus|Gilbert Melki|Maurane|Véronique Barrault|Etienne Chicot|Pierre Vernier|Franck de la Personne|Michel Fortin|Fanny Florido|Jacqueline Vandevelde|Manon Chevallier|Pauline Serieys|Philippe Beglia|Didier Bénureau|Vincent Grass|Catherine Claeys|Gilles David|Hubert Saint-Macary|Alexandra Charles|Brigitte Buc|Nanou Garcia|Alexandra Martinez|Chick Ortega|Jeupeu|Frédéric Papalia|Michel de Warzee|Jim Adhi Limas|Pamela Ruddock|Nicole Duret|Noël Godin|Yves Claessens|Paul Osborne|Marie Mergey|Catherine Hosmalin|Patrick Massieu|Eric De Staercke|Alain Berger|Jonathan Lambert|Tapa Sudana|Keylan Baillargeau|Hiroshi Ichikawa|Sakura Yoshino|Colin Miller|Michel Elias|Joseph Lemercier|Soko|Vincent Bowen|Philippe De Grossouvre|Nick Miseur|Cherie Nichole
title: ¡Palacio Real!
